LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Gecko.label: Gecko
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Gecko.description: An urban combat variant of the Iguana, this model is up-armored with additional electromagnetic plating to protect against shaped charge rounds and explosives.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Gecko.tools.Left_Leg.label: Left Leg
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Gecko.tools.Right_Leg.label: Right Leg
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Gecko.comps.CompMultipleTurretG: Toggle turret to manual control mode to prevent unnecessary shooting.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Iguana.label: Iguana
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Iguana.description: The modernized and redesigned bipedal walking tank based on the Tarbosaurus. This model is produced without the experimental electromagnetic armor allowing it to maintain greater mobility.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Iguana.tools.Left_Leg.label: Left Leg
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Iguana.tools.Right_Leg.label: Right Leg
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Iguana.comps.CompMultipleTurret: Toggle turret to manual control mode to prevent unnecessary shooting.
